Make a bar plot for transect training group comparisons

Source: R/show_compplot.R
show_compplot.Rd

Make a bar plot for transect training group comparisons

show_compplot(
  transect,
  site,
  species = c("Halodule", "Halophila", "Ruppia", "Syringodium", "Thalassia"),
  varplo = c("Abundance", "Blade Length", "Short Shoot Density"),
  base_size = 18,
  xtxt = 10,
  size = 1
)

Arguments

transect

data frame returned by read_transect
site

chr string indicating site results to plot
species

chr string indicating which species to plot
varplo

chr string indicating which variable to plot
base_size

numeric indicating text scaling size for plot
xtxt

numeric indicating text size for x-axis labels
size

numeric indicating line size

Value

A ggplot object

See also

Other visualize: show_boxplot(), show_matrixplotly(), show_matrix(), show_reactable(), show_segmatrix(), show_segplotly(), show_sitemap(), show_tbbimatrix(), show_tbnimatrix(), show_tbniscrall(), show_tbniscrplotly(), show_tbniscr(), show_tdlcrk(), show_thrplot(), show_transectavespp(), show_transectmatrix(), show_transectsum(), show_transect(), show_wqmatrix()

Examples

transect <- read_transect(training = TRUE)
show_compplot(transect, site = '1', species = 'Halodule', varplo = 'Abundance')
